law.catch_line: If sufficient facilities are available, the person in charge of a jail or place of detention shall r...

text.section: If sufficient facilities are available, the person in charge of a jail or place of detention shall receive and confine an individual arrested by a railroad police officer.

An individual confined under subsection (a) of this section:
is deemed to be in the custody of the railroad police; and
has the same status as an individual arrested by any other peace or police officer of the State.
